MarkdownBlockBase.code_block: #sudo rpm -ivh http://dl.fedoraproject.org/pub/epel/6/x86_64/epel-release-6-8.noarch.rpm #sudo yum -y install xrdp tigervnc-server tigervnc-server-module xterm

#sudo zypper in http://download.opensuse.org/repositories/X11:/RemoteDesktop/openSUSE_13.2/x86_64/xrdp-0.9.0git.1401423964-2.1.x86_64.rpm #sudo zypper install tigervnc xorg-x11-Xvnc xterm remmina-plugin-vnc
#sudo service xrdp start #sudo chkconfig xrdp on
#sudo systemctl start xrdp #sudo systemctl enable xrdp
